trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and enables object sharing between applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a implementação base para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objeto interface e permite que a partilha entre aplicações.

trans-unit.source: Component is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference.
trans-unit.target: O componente está a classe base para todos os componentes no tempo de execução de idioma comum empacotar referências por referência.

trans-unit.source: Component is remotable and derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Componente é remota e deriva da <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>classe.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: Component provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: Componente fornece uma implementação do <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> provides an implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> that marshals by value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>fornece uma implementação de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>que marshals por valor.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: You can host a Component in any object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface, and you can query and get services from its container.
trans-unit.target: Pode alojar um componente de qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>interface e pode consultar e obter serviços do respectivo contentor.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The container creates an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> for each Component it contains.
trans-unit.target: O contentor cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>para cada componente nele contidos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The container uses the site to manage the Component and is used by the Component to communicate with its container.
trans-unit.target: O contentor utiliza o site para gerir o componente e é utilizado pelo componente para comunicar com o respectivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: A Component should release resources explicitly by calls to its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um componente deve libertar recursos explicitamente por chamadas para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>método, sem aguardar a gestão de memória automático através de uma chamada implícita para o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> is disposed, all components within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> are also disposed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>é eliminado, todos os componentes dentro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>também são eliminados depois.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o componente pode gerar um evento.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a implementação de predefinição desta propriedade sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events.
trans-unit.target: As classes que herdam a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>classe deve ignorar esta propriedade para fornecer a capacidade de desativar o acionamento de eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe, se o controlo está a ser alojado como um controlo ActiveX, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A>propriedade devolve `false` se o controlo ActiveX tem os eventos congelados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component can raise events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o componente pode gerar eventos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: Os componentes num contentor são controlados numa first in, First out lista, que também define a ordem dos componentes no contentor.

trans-unit.source: The last component added is the last component in the list.
trans-unit.target: O último componente adicionado é o último componente na lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> não está a ser encapsulada num <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> está atualmente em modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The design mode indicator is stored in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; therefore, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O indicador de modo de estrutura é armazenado no <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; por conseguinte, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>não tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>associada, o valor desta propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> está no modo de estrutura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>foi occupying.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o componente é eliminado por uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: When you create a Disposed delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado eliminado, identifique o método que processa o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de processadores de eventos que estão anexados a este <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref> that provides the delegates for this component.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"> </xref> que fornece os delegados para este componente.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza recursos não geridos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é reclamada a recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> or by its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um objeto que representa um serviço fornecido pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> ou pelo respetivo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído por uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço fornecido pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not provide the specified service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa um serviço fornecido pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> não fornece o serviço especificado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> will have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>terá uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>se foi adicionado um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>atribui um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>ao mesmo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> is responsible for assigning the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>É responsável pela atribuição <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> does not necessarily change the name of the site the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor do componente <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>não necessariamente alterar o nome do site a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>está atribuída.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The Site property should be set only by an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Site deve ser definida apenas por um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The property value is `null` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is removed from its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é `null` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>é removido do respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir `null` para esta propriedade não necessariamente Remova <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>do <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> might or might not have a name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>poderá ou poderá não ter um nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name must be unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>é fornecido um nome, o nome tem de ser exclusivo, entre outros <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objetos dentro do respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>; therefore, you can only name a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> if it has an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Armazena o nome do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>por conseguinte, apenas pode nome um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>se tem uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>associado ao mesmo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>, the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not have an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with it, or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is removed from its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> não está a ser encapsulada num <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> não tem um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associado ao mesmo, ou o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é removido do respetivo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>pode ou não ter um nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>é fornecido um nome, o nome é exclusivo, entre outros <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objetos dentro do respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Armazena o nome do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>só pode ter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>se foi adicionado um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>atribui um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>ao mesmo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.</xref:System.String>
